cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("lowercase")

	LOWERCASE("dst", "src")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: lowercase
processors:
  - lowercase:
      tag: lowercase_src_into_dst_9c957f69
      field: src
      target_field: dst
